item.title: Cursor - The AI-first Code Editor
item.description: Import all your extensions, themes, and keybindings in one click. With privacy mode, none of your code is stored by us. Cursor is SOC 2 certified.

item.title: KeyTube 楽曲分析＆ゲーム
item.description: KeyTubeへようこそ 110798曲の楽曲、13041組のアーティストの音域などの楽曲分析と歌詞タイピングゲームなどの楽曲ゲームのサイトです 人気楽曲から探す ライラック アイドル ケセラセラ 唱 さよーならまたいつか!- Sayonara オ

item.title: Mediocre Engineer’s guide to HTTPS
item.description: As a mediocre engineer, I took Internet and HTTPS communication for granted and never dove any deeper. Today we’re improving as engineers and learning a rough overview of how internet communication works, specifically focusing on HTTP and TLS.
